p: The second new entity is the Global Polio Partners Group (PPG). The PPG serves as a stakeholdersâ€™ voice for the GPEI and reports the results to the Polio Oversight Board. The addition of this group has expanded the input given to polio decision-makers. It includes a wide range of organizations who are involved in polio, including donor and endemic country governments. However, the group is somewhat informal in nature and its recommendations are nonbinding.
